name: Next.js + Tailwind + Radix UI
description: Accessible component library with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Radix UI primitives. Built for applications requiring maximum accessibility compliance.

aiContext.designPhilosophy: Accessibility-first design using Radix UI primitives. Components are unstyled by default, allowing full customization while maintaining accessibility.
aiContext.colorGuidance: Primary indigo for key interactions. Ensure all color combinations meet WCAG AAA contrast ratios where possible.
aiContext.componentGuidance: Use Radix UI primitives for complex components like dialogs, dropdowns, and tooltips. Style with Tailwind CSS utility classes.
aiContext.accessibilityNotes: Radix provides built-in keyboard navigation, focus management, and ARIA attributes. All components target WCAG 2.1 AAA compliance.
